title: Did Riot get rid of Blind Pick in PBE?
body: I can't open my normal client right now so idk if it's gone on there but on pbe blind pick game option is gone. so is normal draft. all they have now when u click on pvp>classic>summoner's rift 5v5, it show's only rank flex and rank solo/duo? what's up with this? i dont play rank or normal draft because it takes forever. I only play blind pick but now its gone.

replies.body:
We don't always test all game modes on the PBE and you'll sometimes see certain game modes disabled so we can test others.

I hope that clears up the confusion. Let me know if you have any other questions.
